content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games and program.
I'm an actor, but I'm currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
That sounds nice! I work at a factory.
No way! That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a video game character.
It's really fun! But it can be a lot of work.
I can imagine! I'm sure you're very good at it.
Thank you! I try my best.
What's your favorite video game character that you've created?
That's a tough question! I'm not sure I could pick just one.
I know what you mean. I have a hard time picking my favorite movie character.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
